event.title: C Training in Chennai
event.description: C is a procedure oriented-language whereas C++ is an object-oriented language. C++ is an extension of C language. Many programs including Java, C# are influenced by C++ programming language. C++ is widely used in many areas like developing games, browsers, graphics, bank applications and so on. If you want to build a strong career in C and C++ programming, learn from our certified professionals at FITA Academy. The classes can be customized as per individual needs. Enroll today at C C++ Training in Chennai and contact us at 98404-11333 for further details.
event.address: 37F Velachery Main Road, Velachery,  Chennai - 600042 Tamil Nadu
